doc.title: Hindi mo ako kayang tapakan (????)
doc.plot: World War II, the dark years in Philippine history. This is the story of Tacing (Charo Santos) - a woman involved in different love affairs which resulted in endless trials and tribulations. Angelito, her first true love, deceived and abandoned her. Instead of accepting her responsibility, he paid her, enough to change her life. Hesistant with the decision, she went to Manila in search of a better life for her child. Fortunately, luck is on her side. Nardo, Tom, Ramon and Angelito were just some of the many men who became part of Tacing's life and played parts in making her accept the reality of womanhood.
